title: meatballs stroganoff
directions: combine ground beef, egg, bread crumbs, 1/4 cup sour cream and half the onion
shape into 1.25" balls and saute in large sklillet, turning until brown
scatter garlic and remining onion around meatballs and cook for 5 minutes
stir in tomato paste mixed with water or wine, cover and simmer for 5 minutes
blend in remining sour cream and bring to a simmer but do not boil
sserve over buttered noodles and garnish with parsley
